docTitle.titlePart:
RetroArray -a comprehensive diagnostic DNA chip for
rapid detection and identification of retroviruses

byline.affiliation: 1 Medical Clinic III, Medical Faculty Mannheim of the University

2 Helmholtz Center Munich, German Research Center for Environmental Health,
Institute of Molecular Virology,

front.div:
We offer a fast and reliable DNA chip-based assay (RetroArray) for parallel detection and
identification of a wide variety of human and mammalian exogenous and endogenous
retroviruses (ERV) in biological samples. The assay combines multiplex polymerase chain
reaction (PCR) using fluorochrome-modified primers and non-radioactive DNA chip
hybridization (figure 1) and features considerable advantages over conventional methods.
